jrtr

Interface RenderPanel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GLDeferredRenderPanel, GLRenderPanel, simple.SimpleRenderPanel, SimpleOpenVR.SimpleVRRenderPanel, SWRenderPanel, VRRenderPanel

    public interface RenderPanel
    An interface to display images that are rendered by a render context (a "renderer"). Currently, this interface is implemented by GLRenderPanel and SWRenderPanel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Component getCanvas()
      Obtain a Component that contains the rendered image.
      void init(RenderContext renderContext)
      This is a call-back that needs to be implemented by the user to initialize the renderContext.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(RenderContext renderContext)
        This is a call-back that needs to be implemented by the user to initialize the renderContext.

      • getCanvas

        java.awt.Component getCanvas()
        Obtain a Component that contains the rendered image.
